_comment: Ship definitions. Each ship has unique stats, phase shift config, and starting weapon. Stats only listed here override base_player_stats.json defaults.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: Fast and agile reconnaissance vessel. Perfect for beginners.

phase_shift.name: Phase Shift
phase_shift.description: Standard phase shift with moderate range

interceptor.name: Interceptor
interceptor.description: Lightning fast strike craft. High risk, high reward.

phase_shift.name: Blink
phase_shift.description: Instant teleport with no trail, shorter range but faster recharge

fortress.name: Fortress
fortress.description: Heavy armored vessel. Slow but incredibly durable.

phase_shift.name: Ram Shift
phase_shift.description: Slower shift but damages and knocks back enemies in path
